page_content: The page discusses the impact of the Coronavirus on domestic violence and offers resources for support.
The page discusses the establishment of AppRiver's European headquarters in Aargau, facilitated by ICT service provider green.ch.
The page provides newsletters from the Department of Civil Engineering, covering various topics related to infrastructure but not specifically about software.
The page discusses the new training concept for civil protection instructors, detailing the curriculum and duration.
The page discusses the digital transformation of public services through the Smart Service Portal, focusing on customer-centricity and process optimization.
